definitions.definition: One of successive or homodynamous parts in animals and plants ; one of a series of similar parts that follow one another in a vertebrate or articulate animal , as in an earthworm ; a segment or somite .

main_definition: ( biology ) One of successive or homodynamous parts in animals and plants ; one of a series of similar parts that follow one another in a vertebrate or articulate animal , as in an earthworm ; a segment or somite .
